name: Thandai Ice cream Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Thandai Ice cream Recipe: Cream ½ kg Milk 1 liter Green cardamom powder 6-8 pieces Cashew nut powder ¼ cup Pistachio powder 2 tbsp Saffron a pinch Sugar 1-1/2 cup Almond powder 3 tbsp Whole dried milk 1 cup Corn flour 5 tbsp Evaporated milk 1 tin
instructions: In a pan add milk, cream and sugar. Bring it to boil then add evaporated milk mixed with corn flour and keep mixing for a minute. Now add remaining ingredients and cook for 5 minutes then cool and grind to a fine paste. Then add this to the ice cream machine and freeze for 45 minutes. Remove and freeze. Serve.
